title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Nelson H. Hotchkiss, October 3, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss describes to his brother news about recent skirmishes and the damage done by Federal troops in the Valley. He also relates news of people back home.
keywords: Battle Description, Prisons/Prisoners, Troop Movement, Family, Enlistment, Home Front, Agriculture, Women, Death/Casualties, Church/Religious Activity, American Civil War
